#include <iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#define N 10001
 
using namespace std;
 int readint()
    {
       int cc = getc(stdin);
       for (;cc < '0' || cc > '9';)  cc = getc(stdin);
       int ret = 0;
       for (;cc >= '0' && cc <= '9';)
       {
          ret = ret * 10 + cc - '0';
          cc = getc(stdin);
       }
      return ret;
   }
int main() {
	// your code goes here
	int n,q;
	scanf("%d%d",&n,&q);
	int i,j;
	int lane[n];
	for(i=0;i<n;i++)
	     lane[i]=readint();
	     //scanf("%d",&lane[i]);
	for(i=0;i<q;i++)
	{
		int x,y;
		//scanf("%d%d",&x,&y);
		x=readint();
		y=readint();
		int count=0;
		int arr[N]={0};
		for(j=x-1;j<y;j++)
		{
			if(arr[lane[j]]==0)
			     {
			     	arr[lane[j]]++;
			     	count++;
			     }
		}
		printf("%d\n",count);
	}
	return 0;
}
